RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS MORO was forced a bit wide to race six deep into the first turn, settled near the back of the pack early on, made a strong moved up from the outside of rivals while racing five past the quarter pole and finished well to be clear late under steady pressure. BEING CREATIVE was off the early pace, moved up two wide near the quarter pole, swung six wide into the upper stretch and rallied willingly to the wire. CAIRO SUMMER stalked the pace along the inside, raced three wide around the far turn, angled widest in the stretch run and improved position. MOANA'S TALE was unhurried early, made a good moved up into the lane and flattened out with no final run. TICKLISH raced mid pack early on, was four deep in the stretch run and had no response. HALOFIED stalked the pace, made a early three wide bid near the three eighths pole and faltered in the drive. FREE TO RUN pressed the pace from the outside of foe and weakened. LADY MECHANIC showed good early foot from the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, 3p turn, angled widest stretch, moved up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 23 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races W here Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COME SEE ABOUT IT showed good early foot to set the early pace with a clear into the backstretch, met bid near the half mile pole to be pressed from the outside, responded well to be clear late under strong handling. NIGHT TIME RULER stalked the pace, asked near the half mile pole to press from the outside of foe, couldn't match strides with winner and held the place position late. FALCONS FURY was rated along early to race in hand, asked through the far turn, swung seven wide and finished willingly to the wire. VISUAL MISSION was void of early speed, raced two to three wide in the lane and had not enough. UPTOWN broke awkwardly, lost a considerable amount of ground at the start, moved up from the inside down the backstretch to stalk the top pair and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Night Time Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed 1/2 pole, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Visual Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 2-3 wide, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 66. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 23 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMERSON JONES lost his iron briefly at the start, took the early lead along the inside, dug in late from the two path and prevailed under all out pressure. DANZA MAGIC chased the early pace, raced three wide around the far turn, closed in well late and just missed while racing four deep. HELLO SWEETS chased the early pace from the inside, made a good rail bid in the lane and finished willingly to the wire. SAVESOMEFORME settled off the early going, move up three wide past the quarter pole, raced from the outside in the drive and closed in belatedly. SORORITY SISTER was rated along early, made a four wide bid near the quarter pole and faltered in the drive. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ settle early, raced four to three wide in the stretch run and lacked a rally. TRULY INCLUSIVE was hard ridden near the three eighths pole while racing two wide and faded. MARGARITA CINCO raced near the inside down the backstretch, raced three to four wide in stretch run and had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Emerson Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost irons briefly early, pace inside, prevailed, 2p

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie's Chantz
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, 4-3 wide, lacked rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 l bs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAUSE OF LOVE chased the early pace from the inside down the backstretch, swung wide into the upper stretch, shifted in through the stretch run and got up late under strong handling. KICHI KITSU showed good early speed to set the early pace along the inside, had a clear lead nearing the sixteenth pole and was wore down late to narrowly hold the place position. DANCIN' ROSIE raced off the early pace, was four wide near the quarter pole and slowly closed in on the top pair. ROLLIN ALL THE WAY was coaxed outside of foe and weakened a bit in the final stages. CATABOUT raced off the early going, angled widest into the stretch and never threatened. LEXY ANNA was coaxed along from the inside, was shuffled back near the three eighths pole and tired in the drive. CHLOES ANGEL dropped back early, raced along the inside around the far turn and lacked a bid. QUEEN AIR vied for the early lead while racing between rivals, stopped and bled.

ENTRY.NAME: Catabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, angled widest stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Chloes Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside turn, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Cause of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, swung wide upper stretch, shift in, up

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin All the Way
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Trusso Tony

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 23 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WICKED CHANCE raced mid pack early on, moved up six wide nearing the three sixteenths pole, surged late and just got up while racing from the outside. PRIVATE CONNIE stalked the pace from the outside, made a four wide bid near the quarter pole, raced between in the stretch run and just missed. SUPER BROTHER settled off the early going, moved up from the far outside in the stretch run and closed in belatedly. CONSIDER ME showed good early foot to set the early pace, had a clear lead at the eighth pole and weakened a bit late. SCRATCHOFF prompt the pace from the inside, was in contention inside the eighth pole and was outkicked while racing near the rail. RIKIO raced off the early going, angled wide into the upper lane and had a mild late gain. DAWN WEST dropped back early raced along the inside around the far turn and had not enough in the drive. NITROMAN was forwardly placed to lay up close, raced three to four wide and weakened. SILVER MATT was away slowly, raced with the second flight and lacked a bid. ROSE'S PEPINO raced off the early pace, was three wide near the quarter pole and had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Dawn West
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside turn, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Rikio
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline, Robert and Lucas, Robert A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, swung wide upper stretch, late gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Purse 31900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 23 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREE SAILIN settled off the early pace, made a four wide near the three eighths pole, raced five deep near the three sixteenths pole and finished well to edge clear under strong pressure. IRISH UNITY pressed the early pace while racing outside of for, took command through the far turn, raced two wide in the lane and was no match for the winner to finish second best. ATOMIC TONE stalked the pace, made a three wide between near the three eighths pole and kept on to the wire. DYRDEK was off a step slow, raced near the back of the pack early on, moved up from the outside in the stretch and improved position. LATIN SPICE vied for the early lead from the inside and weakened. NAUGHTY PRINCE stalked the pace, raced from the inside in the stretch, angled out near the eighth pole and raced evenly with no closing run. CHIEF RANDEL raced mid pack early, was three wide around the far turn and had no response. NICK CAN FIX dropped to the back of the pack early, swung wide into the upper stretch and lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Dyrdek
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved up, outside

ENTRY.NAME: Nick Can Fix
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, swung wide into upper stretch, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APPEALING SENORITA rated along early, made a three wide bid near the five sixteenths pole to take command and drew off late to be clear under steady encouragement. CROSSED UP pressed the early leader from the outside, dropped back a bit through the far turn, re-bid in the lane and narrowly got up for the place position while racing five deep. EASTER PRIDE race mid pack early on, moved up from the outside in the lane and finished willingly to the wire. LARSA showed good early foot to set the early pace along the inside and weakened a bit late. MY PINK BABY BIRD dropped back off the early pace, raced two three wide around the far turn and lacked a bid. WAR MOON dropped back to the rear early on, angled wide into the upper stretch and never threatened. MILWAUKEE CAT raced off the early pace, was near the inside around the far turn and lacked a rally. PRICEY APPEAL was slow early, raced three wide near the quarter pole, angled out through the stretch and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Milwaukee Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: War Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, angled wide upper stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Pricey Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 3wd 1/4, angled out, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Baby Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2-3 wide turn, lacked bid

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: W. John Bourke & Lowell F. Allen

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 43. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPLENDID SPIRIT showed good early foot to set the pace along the inside and drew off the inside stretch to be well clear under steady pressure. INDY CARR settled off the early going, raced four wide near the quarter pole and finished well to get up for the place position. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN raced six wide into the first turn, stalked the pace from the outside, was five deep just past the three sixteenths pole and kept on to the wire. MY TICKET tracked the pace from the inside and weakened. RUNAWAY RUSSELL stalked the pace and tired. MUSIC GEM raced off the early going, was four to five wide into the upper stretch and never threatened. BIRD GONE WEST was off slowly, raced near the inside past the quarter pole and never menaced. NOSEY POWER dropped back early, raced far back and never was involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Music Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4-5 wide upper stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Bird Gone West
ENTRY.OWNER: Martin Paul E Dellbringge Ronald and Roy Reggie

ENTRY.NAME: Nosey Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, far back, no bid
